messages.subject: using Yahoo Flickr for photos
messages.msgSnippet: I personally find Flickr very straightforward once you figure it out...and it s pretty easy to figure out. I just played around with all the features to see
messages.messageBody:
I personally find Flickr very straightforward once you figure it
out...and it's pretty easy to figure out. I just played around with
all the features to see what they did.
I love that I can use my Yahoo ID for signing in too.

You create your own account, but then you can join "groups" at Flickr
whick are photo sharing pools. Here's a link to the unschooling pool:
http://flickr.com/groups/unschooling/

Imagination Tribe also has a photo pool, full of everyone's art and
the group projects: http://flickr.com/groups/imaginationtribe/

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
